subject: Communication
title: Persuasion Resistance: Building Immunity
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Persuasion Resistance: Building Immunity.

hook.text: Knowing how persuasion works doesn't make you immune to it. But it does make you harder to fool.

buildup.text: Inoculation theory says exposing people to weak versions of persuasive arguments builds resistance.

discovery.text: Like a vaccine, small doses of manipulation teach your brain to recognize and resist the real thing.

twist.text: But resistance requires effort. Under stress, fatigue, or time pressure, even experts fall for old tricks.

climax.text: The best defense isn't awareness alone â€” it's pausing before deciding and asking 'What are they really selling?'

punchline.text: You can't block persuasion. You can slow it down.
